A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A sickening gut punch of a movie.

The visuals and music were gorgeous but thats where the good stuff ends. This was a bad movie and absolutely awful star wars movie. The story made no sense\, existing lore and continuity was completely disregarded\, Luke is utterly unrecognisable from his original beloved character\, dialogue is terrible and plot holes abound.

This film as killed the remaining love I had for the start wars universe
